lines_and_colors: We talked with each other about each other
We were too engrossed with the Second's Races
And the Hoofs of the Clock -
Pausing in front of our sentenced Faces
Arks of Reprieve he opened to us -
document.title: We talked with each other about each other
document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
